sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BASS0350 ( DPOB_CD , DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , TYP_OCCU_CD , DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , PYSP_GRDE_CD , DTIL_OCCU_CLS_NM , DTIL_OCCU_JBFML_DIV_CD , DTIL_OCCU_CLS_USE_YN , CHNG_TGT_YN , DTIL_OCCU_CLS_CTNT , DTIL_OCCU_CLS_ORD , BGG_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #dtilOccuInttnCd# , #typOccuCd# , #dtilOccuClsDivCd# , #pyspGrdeCd# , #dtilOccuClsNm# , #dtilOccuJbfmlDivCd# , #dtilOccuClsUseYn# , #chngTgtYn# , #dtilOccuClsCtnt# , #dtilOccuClsOrd# , #bggLogSvcYrNumCd# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BASS0350 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD=#dtilOccuInttnCd# , TYP_OCCU_CD=#typOccuCd# , DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD=#dtilOccuClsDivCd# , PYSP_GRDE_CD=#pyspGrdeCd# , DTIL_OCCU_CLS_NM=#dtilOccuClsNm# , DTIL_OCCU_JBFML_DIV_CD=#dtilOccuJbfmlDivCd# , DTIL_OCCU_CLS_USE_YN=#dtilOccuClsUseYn# , CHNG_TGT_YN=#chngTgtYn# , DTIL_OCCU_CLS_CTNT=#dtilOccuClsCtnt# , DTIL_OCCU_CLS_ORD=#dtilOccuClsOrd# , BGG_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD=#bggLogSvcYrNumCd# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD=#dtilOccuInttnCd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM BASS0350 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD=#dtilOccuInttnCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , TYP_OCCU_CD , DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , PYSP_GRDE_CD , DTIL_OCCU_CLS_NM , DTIL_OCCU_JBFML_DIV_CD , DTIL_OCCU_CLS_USE_YN , CHNG_TGT_YN , DTIL_OCCU_CLS_CTNT , DTIL_OCCU_CLS_ORD , BGG_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ,DTIL_OCCLS_APPTN_UCST_CD , DTIL_OCCLS_APPTN_UCST_SUM , CHNG_TYP_OCCU_CD , CHNG_DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_STDT , DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_EDDT FROM BASS0350 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD=#dtilOccuInttnCd#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , TYP_OCCU_CD , DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , PYSP_GRDE_CD , DTIL_OCCU_CLS_NM , DTIL_OCCU_JBFML_DIV_CD , DTIL_OCCU_CLS_USE_YN , CHNG_TGT_YN , DTIL_OCCU_CLS_CTNT , DTIL_OCCU_CLS_ORD , BGG_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD ,DTIL_OCCLS_APPTN_UCST_CD , DTIL_OCCLS_APPTN_UCST_SUM , CHNG_TYP_OCCU_CD , CHNG_DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_STDT , DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_EDDT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM BASS0350 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD DESC , DTIL_OCCU_CLS_USE_YN DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM BASS0350 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'

SELECT C.DPOB_CD , C.TYP_OCCU_CD ,C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, fcBass0320CDNM(C.DPOB_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM, C.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_NM, C.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_USE_YN FROM BASS0350 C WHERE C.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AND C.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_NM LIKE '%' || #dtilOccuClsNm# || '%'
#strDate# BETWEEN SUBSTR((NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_STDT,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'))),1,4) AND SUBSTR((NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_EDDT,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'))),1,4)
#strDate# BETWEEN SUBSTR((NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_STDT,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'))),1,6) AND SUBSTR((NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_EDDT,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'))),1,6)
#strDate# BETWEEN (NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_STDT,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'))) AND (NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_EDDT,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')))
CHNG_TYP_OCCU_CD
#typOccuCdArr[]#
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM BASS0360 D WHERE D.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AND D.DEPT_CD = #deptCd#
AND C.DPOB_CD = D.DPOB_CD AND C.TYP_OCCU_CD = D.TYP_OCCU_CD AND C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = D.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD)

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM BASS0350 C WHERE C.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AND C.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_NM LIKE '%' || #dtilOccuClsNm# || '%'
#strDate# BETWEEN SUBSTR((NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_STDT,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'))),1,4) AND SUBSTR((NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_EDDT,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'))),1,4)
#strDate# BETWEEN SUBSTR((NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_STDT,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'))),1,6) AND SUBSTR((NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_EDDT,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'))),1,6)
#strDate# BETWEEN (NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_STDT,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'))) AND (NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_EDDT,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')))
CHNG_TYP_OCCU_CD
#typOccuCdArr[]#
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM BASS0360 D WHERE D.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AND D.DEPT_CD = #deptCd#
AND C.DPOB_CD = D.DPOB_CD AND C.TYP_OCCU_CD = D.TYP_OCCU_CD AND C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = D.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD)
